id: November 25th, 11am - 12pm ET | Build a Second Brain with Notion
name: November 25th, 11am - 12pm ET | Build a Second Brain with Notion
description: Thank you for joining our live event Building a Second Brain with Notion!The second brain concept is a great way to use Notion, because of Notion's capabilities to store data in various ways. From notes, web pages, ideas, to thoughts you can easily put everything into Notion so that it can act as your "Second Brain"! We'll cover basic second brain concepts and then move into a build-with-me session!Who is this event for?If you're new to Notion or want a way to level-up your Notion experience wit
